Container.Name: MeTube
Container.Overview: Web GUI for youtube-dl (using the yt-dlp fork) with playlist support. Allows you to download videos from YouTube and dozens of other sites.
Container.ExtraSearchTerms: youtube-dl yt-dlp youtube video download playlist

Config.Name: Web UI Port
Config.Description: Container Port: 8081

Config.Name: Downloads path
Config.Description: Storage for downloaded files

Config.Name: Theme
Config.Description: Default theme for the web interface

Config.Name: Output Template
Config.Description: Output template for the downloaded files

Config.Name: Output Template - Chapters
Config.Description: Output template for the downloaded chapters. Default to OUTPUT_TEMPLATE if empty.

Config.Name: Output Template - Playlist
Config.Description: Output template for the downloaded playlist. Default to OUTPUT_TEMPLATE if empty.

Config.Name: Internal Download Directory
Config.Description: Directory where the downloads are stored inside the container

Config.Name: Internal Audio Download Directory
Config.Description: Directory where the audio downloads are stored inside the container

Config.Name: Indexable Download Directories
Config.Description: If true, the download dirs (DOWNLOAD_DIR and AUDIO_DOWNLOAD_DIR) are indexable on the webserver.

Config.Name: Enable Custom Directory Selection
Config.Description: When enabled, a drop-down appears next to the Add button to specify the download directory.

Config.Name: Create Custom Directories
Config.Description: Automatically create custom directories if they do not exist. When enabled, the download directory selector becomes supports free-text input, and the specified directory will be created recursively.

Config.Name: Internal State Directory
Config.Description: Where the queue persistence files will be saved

Config.Name: Internal Temp Directory
Config.Description: Where temporary files will be saved

Config.Name: Delete From Filesystem
Config.Description: Delete the file from the filesystem when it is removed from the 'Completed' section on the UI.

Config.Name: URL Prefix
Config.Description: Base path for the web server (for use when hosting behind a reverse proxy)

Config.Name: Public Host URL
Config.Description: Base URL for the download links shown in the UI for completed files. By default MeTube serves them under its own URL. If your download directory is accessible on another URL and you want the download links to be based there, use this variable to set it.

Config.Name: Use SSL
Config.Description: Enable HTTPS

Config.Name: SSL Certificate
Config.Description: Path to the SSL certificate. Required if HTTPS enabled.

Config.Name: SSL Key
Config.Description: Path to the SSL key. Required if HTTPS enabled.

Config.Name: Public Host URL (Audio)
Config.Description: Base URL for the audio download links shown in the UI for completed files. By default MeTube serves them under its own URL. If your audio download directory is accessible on another URL and you want the download links to be based there, use this variable to set it.

Config.Name: Strict Playlist Mode
Config.Description: If true, the 'Strict Playlist mode' switch will be enabled by default. In this mode the playlists will be downloaded only if the URL strictly points to a playlist. URLs to videos inside a playlist will be treated same as direct video URL.

Config.Name: Max Number of Playlist Items
Config.Description: Maximum number of items to download from a playlist. 0 means no limit.

Config.Name: YTDL Options
Config.Description: Additional options to pass to youtube-dl

Config.Name: YTDL Options File
Config.Description: Path to a file containing additional options to pass to youtube-dl

Config.Name: Robots.txt File
Config.Description: Path to a file containing the robots.txt content
